effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 520,400.
(4) Set: When you cast Healing Rain, 1 ally in the radius has Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.
Set: Tidal Waves increases the healing of affected spells by 10%.
Set: Tidal Waves is 80% more effective and reduces the mana cost of affected spells by 8%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 21,777 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 65,331 Nature Damage instead.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,421, up to 12,109.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.7 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)
